reason: P1.1 Interactive Widgets - Component exists but not integrated into editor UI
notes: Component exists but not in editor page p1Tools array. Either integrate or remove.

reason: NAV.PRESENTATIONS list page not implemented
notes: Route exists in docs but page not created. Needs user's presentation library implementation.

reason: Tests for unintegrated component
notes: Tests exist for P1.1 but feature not accessible. Clean up if component removed.

reason: No visual slide thumbnails in editor
notes: UX critique issue #8 - Only shows 'Slide X / 10' with arrows. Needs SlidesPanel component.

reason: No mobile-optimized toolbar
notes: UX critique issue #4 - Needs MobileToolbar.tsx and BottomNav.tsx for responsive design.

reason: Only UI buttons exist in EditorToolbar
notes: Buttons exist but no actual undo/redo logic. Need command pattern with history stack.

reason: Separate register page not needed
notes: OAuth auto-registers users. Dedicated register page is redundant.

reason: Duplicate template selection in home page
notes: TemplateSelector component used in home page. Check if TemplateLibrary has overlap.

reason: Missing E2E tests for navigation flows
notes: Auth E2E exists but no tests for /library, /analytics, /settings navigation.

reason: KeyboardShortcutsButton exists but modal not implemented
notes: Button exists in editor but actual shortcuts modal content missing.

reason: Right-click context menu not implemented
notes: Docs mention context menu for slide operations but not in current UI.

reason: No EmptyState.tsx component
notes: UX critique issue #12 - Need illustrations for empty states. Currently just text.

reason: No tooltip implementation for toolbar icons
notes: UX critique issue #13 - No tooltips on icon buttons. Need Radix UI Tooltip integration.

reason: No focus management in panels/modals
notes: UX critique issue #20 - Need focus trapping when panels open.

reason: No skip-to-content link for accessibility
notes: UX critique issue #19 - Need skip link at top of page for keyboard users.

reason: AIBadge.tsx exists but not consistently used
notes: AIBadge in EditorToolbar but not in ContentQualityPanel, VoiceNarrator needs updates.

reason: No dark mode implementation
notes: UX critique low priority - Need theme toggle and dark variants.

reason: No skeleton loaders
notes: UX critique issue #25 - Mix of loading states. Need unified skeleton UI.

reason: No toast notification system
notes: UX critique issue #26 - Inconsistent error handling. Need toast system (sonner?).

reason: SlideDuplicator has reordering but no visual drag
notes: Component exists but drag-and-drop UI not fully implemented in editor.

reason: Developer dashboard but no UI to access it
notes: Component exists but no route or link to access it. Add to dev menu or remove.

reason: Contract tests exist but not in CI/CD
notes: 39 contract tests but no CI workflow. Add to .github/workflows/.

reason: api-docs page exists but content minimal
notes: Route /api-docs exists but needs comprehensive API documentation content.

reason: Offline support mentioned in CHANGELOG but not implemented
notes: CHANGELOG mentions service worker for offline mode but not found in codebase.

reason: PWA manifest and icons not configured
notes: No manifest.json or PWA configuration. Needed for mobile app-like experience.

reason: Settings page exists but no subpages for fonts integrations
notes: Settings page basic. Need /settings/fonts /settings/integrations subpages.

reason: TemplateLibrary needs category filtering
notes: Templates exist but no category-based filtering UI in library page.

reason: ThemesMarketplace exists but no actual payment flow
notes: Marketplace UI exists but no Stripe/payment integration for purchasing themes.

reason: Auth docs mention cross-tab sync but not fully implemented
notes: Storage events setup but cross-tab session sync needs testing/completion.

reason: NFTMinter exists but wallet connection UX incomplete
notes: Component exists but onboarding wizard mentioned in CHANGELOG not implemented.

reason: ARPresentationMode needs simplified calibration
notes: CHANGELOG notes 38% completion - needs reduction from 5 steps to 2 steps.

reason: ThreeDAnimationEditor needs device performance checks
notes: CHANGELOG notes lag on low-end devices. Need auto-disable on <2GB RAM.

reason: LanguageSelector exists but no i18n string files
notes: Language selector UI exists but no actual translation JSON files for 20+ languages.

reason: CollaborationPanel exists but WebSocket backend not connected
notes: Real-time collab UI exists but backend WebSocket server needs implementation.

reason: Collaboration docs mention commenting but UI not implemented
notes: CollaborationPanel exists but inline commenting UI not visible.

reason: AnalyticsDashboard mentions heatmaps but not implemented
notes: Dashboard exists but heatmap visualization not in component.

reason: CHANGELOG v2.1.0 mentions batch export but not implemented
notes: Export single presentation works. Batch export for multiple not in UI.

reason: CHANGELOG v2.1.0 mentions AI layout suggestions but not implemented
notes: AI image generation exists but smart layout suggestions feature not started.

reason: VersionHistoryPanel mentions compare versions but no diff UI
notes: Version history timeline exists but visual diff comparison not implemented.

reason: Sidebar has search button but no search functionality
notes: Search icon in home sidebar (line 298) but clicking does nothing.

reason: CHANGELOG v2.1.0 roadmap but only 11 templates exist
notes: Currently 11 templates (SLIDE_TEMPLATES). Roadmap promises 50+ across 10 categories.

reason: VideoEmbedder exists but no thumbnail preview mentioned
notes: Video embed works but automatic thumbnail generation not visible.

reason: ChartInserter exists but no live data refresh
notes: Static chart insertion works. Live data refresh for real-time charts missing.

reason: FontUploader exists but no preview before upload
notes: Upload works but user can't preview font before applying to slides.

reason: MasterSlideEditor mentions bulk apply but UI unclear
notes: Master slide creation works. Bulk application to all slides needs clearer UX.

reason: TransitionSelector exists but no live preview
notes: Transition selection works but user can't preview animation before applying.

reason: AccessibilityChecker mentions auto-fix but not implemented
notes: Checker identifies issues. Auto-fix suggestions exist but auto-apply missing.

reason: ContentQualityPanel shows overall score but no breakdown
notes: LLM judge gives quality score. Detailed clarity engagement readability breakdown needed.

reason: TextOverflowManager exists but no auto-detection trigger
notes: Manual tool works. Auto-detection when content overflows not implemented.

reason: ImageOptimizer mentions format conversion but limited options
notes: Compression works. Full format conversion (WebP JPEG PNG) needs expansion.

reason: ContentValidator mentions grammar but basic implementation
notes: Spell check works. Advanced grammar checking (Grammarly-level) not implemented.

reason: SpeakerNotesPanel mentions markdown but rich editor is basic
notes: Rich text editor exists. Full markdown support not visible.

reason: DataImporter mentions auto-chart generation but manual
notes: CSV import works. Automatic chart type suggestion from data not implemented.
